alert.note: Alert for Cowley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 12:21AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Cowley County through 1245 AM CDT... At 1220 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Winfield, moving east to northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail and torrential rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Arkansas City, Winfield, Burden, Dexter, Atlanta, Geuda Springs, Cambridge, Winfield City Lake and Strother Field Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
